parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> System </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Set variable to given value in the variable space of given FSM.
<br>The FSM handle is the number returned by the [[execFSM]] command. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> handle '''setFSMVariable''' [name, value] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> handle: [[Number]] - FSM handle </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [name,value]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> name: [[String]] - name of the FSM variable </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> value: [[Any Value]] - new value of the FSM variable</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER4</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 


</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_handle = [[execFSM]] "test.fsm";
_handle [[setFSMVariable]] ["_foo", 23];
</code>
sets variable <tt>_foo</tt> in the FSM to 23</value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[FSM]], [[commandFSM]], [[completedFSM]], [[doFSM]], [[execFSM]], [[getFSMVariable]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="7"/><value>  </value></part><part><name>MPBEHAVIOUR</name>=<value> 
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part></template>
